item.title: Hobbies vs Professional Development
item.author: Siavash
item.description: This is a very beautiful and interesting video from Dave Farley. I love the guy for his insights. When it comes to development, it’s very important to do exploratory learning via hobbies to learn general matters. However, It’s only when we do professional development based on the requirements of stakeholder that we learn the most and high quality code. This is a selling point for the AI Singapore AIAP program, especially the 100E Program.
